channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for JAVA (Customer Usage Provisioning Servlet)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for JAVA (Customer Usage Provisioning Servlet)

item.title: CVE-2021-27598|2024-08-03T21:26:10.214Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20for%20java%20%28customer%20usage%20provisioning%20servlet%29
item.description: SAP NetWeaver AS JAVA (Customer Usage Provisioning Servlet), versions - 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, allows an attacker to read some statistical data like product version, traffic, timestamp etc. because of missing authorization check in the servlet.
